mapper.select: SELECT t.task_no, t.project_no, t.member_no, t.task_title, t.task_register_date, t.task_content, t.task_status, t.task_start_date, t.task_end_date, f.file_name, f.file_no, f.file_type, f.file_path, f.file_register_date FROM task t JOIN attached_file f ON t.task_no = f.task_no ORDER BY t.task_no ASC
